pr_title: Set the JDK 8 release version to avoid the ALPN issue

timeline.message: Set the JDK 8 release version to avoid the ALPN issue

timeline.author: geoand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -65,6 +65,7 @@ jobs:
         uses: joschi/setup-jdk@b9cc6eabf7e7e3889766b5cee486f874c9e1bd2d
         with:
           java-version: 11
+          release: jdk8u242-b08

replies.bodyText: ... in a step that installs Java 11? :-)
replies.author: Ladicek

timeline.message: Set the JDK 8 release version to avoid the ALPN issue
